mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RBOARD (RNUM,MID,RTITLE,RCONTENT,RFILENAME, RRDATE,RSTATUS, RIP) VALUES(RSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtitle},#{rcontent}, #{rfilename}, SYSDATE, #{rstatus} ,#{rip, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT R.*, MNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = R.MID AND R.MID=#{mid} AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' ORDER BY RRDATE DESC)A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT R.*, MNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = R.MID and r.mid=#{mid} AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' ORDER BY RRDATE DESC, R.RNUM DESC)A)

select.if: SELECT B.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT DISTINCT RSTATUS, RNUM,RTITLE, MNAME, RRDATE,RFILENAME,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M, FRIEND F WHERE(R.MID = F.MID AND M.MID = F.MID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS=0) OR (R.MID=F.FID AND M.MID=F.FID AND MSTATUS =1 AND F.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS = 1) OR (R.MID=M.MID AND M.MID=F.MID AND M.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS = 2 )ORDER BY RRDATE DESC )A)B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT B.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT DISTINCT RSTATUS, RNUM,RTITLE, MNAME, RRDATE,RFILENAME,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M, FRIEND F WHERE(R.MID = F.MID AND M.MID = F.MID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS=0 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR (R.MID=F.FID AND M.MID=F.FID AND MSTATUS =1 AND F.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS = 1 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR (R.MID=M.MID AND M.MID=F.MID AND M.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS = 2 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' ) ORDER BY RRDATE DESC )A)B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

mapper.update: UPDATE RBOARD SET RHIT = RHIT+1 WHERE RNUM=#{rnum}

select.if: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT RNUM)CNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M, FRIEND F WHERE(R.MID = F.MID AND M.MID = F.MID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS=0) OR (R.MID=F.FID AND M.MID=F.FID AND MSTATUS =1 AND F.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS = 1) OR (R.MID=M.MID AND M.MID=F.MID AND M.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS = 2 )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT RNUM)CNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M, FRIEND F WHERE (R.MID = F.MID AND M.MID = F.MID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS=0 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'|||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR (R.MID=F.FID AND M.MID=F.FID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS = 1 AND F.MID=#{mid} AND RTITLE LIKE '%'|||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR (R.MID=M.MID AND M.MID=F.MID AND R.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS =2 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'|||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%');
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM(SELECT H.HNAME FROM BOARD_TAG B, HASHTAG H WHERE B.HNO = H.HNO AND B.HNO =#{hno});
